name: Ricetta: polpette di carne aromatizzate
desc: Una ricetta passo dopo passo per preparare delle polpette di carne aromatizzate.

customize.name: Carne misteriosa
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat that seems to be radiating an enigmatic aura. Wonder what it'll taste like?

customize.name: Frumento
customize.desc: Golden, sun-kissed tassels. Needs to be ground down to flour for further use.

customize.name: Cipolla
customize.desc: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.

customize.name: Spezie
customize.desc: A seasoning with varied flavors. It is made from dried Harra Fruits and can enrich the taste of a dish. Therefore, Sumeru locals say, "Spice goes well with anything."

customize.name: Polpette di carne aromatizzate
customize.desc: A dish with ground meat as its base. After crushing the wheat and cooking it over a fire, ground meat was added to form the outer layer. Onions and meat were then stir-fried to make the filling. Finally, the mixture was molded into balls and deep-fried until golden. Enjoying meat by the mouthful has never been this easy!

customize.name: Polpette di carne aromatizzate deliziose
customize.desc: A dish with ground meat as its base. The crunchy and chewy coating wraps around the savory filling, giving it a layered texture that's easily a cut above regular meatballs. Try eating one, and its irresistible aroma will leave you brimming with satisfaction.

customize.name: Polpette di carne aromatizzate sospette
customize.desc: A dish with ground meat as its base. One may find it hard to guess what's inside based on its dull appearance. If you try taking a small bite... Yep, there's wheat in there. It'll probably scrape your lips if you're not careful enough.

customize.text:

value.text: Si acquista parlando con Lambad alla Taverna di Lambad
